website_summaries.verdict: While this music "box" comes without the box itself, it works perfectly as is, or can be fixed into a box of your choosing using the included screws.
pros: Offers exceptional value for money, considering the quality
We love how simple it is to operate — just turn the crank to enjoy the tune
Select from a wide range of songs to suit your preferences
cons: Users report that it is prone to go out of tune after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Stairway 2 heck yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Buy now! B4 it sells out! Cmon now- A 1970s rock ‘n’ roll top five legends classic for the price of a hamburger and coffee please/buy this thing now and be satisfied packaged safe with expediting to California I live in the foothills near Yosemite national Park and no issues but it will run out soon because these are certainly hand built.... a lil?! Does anybody remember laughter?!...?
customer_reviews.author: Tennis lovr

customer_reviews.title: Boys who take apart EVERYTHING can't break this music box! Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Charming little hand-crank music box is perfect for my son who likes to disassemble EVERYTHING to see how it works. This one comes exactly as shown so he can poke and puzzle over it to his heart's desire without breaking a thing! There are no springs to ruin, no fragile spinners to wreck and no way his little fingers can destroy it. This was a wise purchase after he ruined 3 other music boxes trying to "figure out how they worked" and then became upset when they no longer played music after all his tinkering. Over a month later - after lots of touching and curious prodding - and the music box still works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsy Boy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: not as good as we thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: it does play the song but not as well as we would have thought or liked it to. seems well built but as with all things time will tell. i would have gladly paid more for a better sounding product and a sample of the music would have been a great selling point....if it sounded good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds perfect in person! :)
customer_reviews.text: I got 'Yesterday' and it sounds great! Plays the full first verse (yesterday, all my troubles seemed so far away, now it seems they are hear to stay, oh I believe in yesterday) right on key, surprisingly loud for such a tiny player. My bf will love it! The package is really cute too. Exceeded expectations, I may try ordering some other songs.
customer_reviews.author: Music T

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: It REALLY sucks. I wouldn't give it to the person I was going to give it to... it would have been an insult.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McArdle

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Unit came with no instructions, not sure if all parts were included, had to send back. Seemed kind of cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Eckel

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Elvis loving Secret Pal at work. I had never dealt with a crank music box before, so I was unsure of what to expect. However, I am very please with this product. It's small in size, so it will not take up too much room. It's also fun to crank and listen to the music come alive. I'm hoping my Secret Pal loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Simple Music
customer_reviews.text: What a great item to add to any project. It's perfect just to have too. It works flawlessly every time. My son and wife love playing it time and time again. What simple joy in a complicated world. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love these music boxes but I wish I was able to hear it before buying. For the song Imagine, I noticed a few of the notes were missing. It sounded like a cheap version that tried to rush the basic sound across. For any Beatles fan, you might be disappointed. I wasnt look for an orchestrated music box or anything fancy at all, but there are those small notes you notice in meaningful songs (that really 'make' the songs at that!), that this music box just did not include. Its a gift for my brother, I know he will notice it too, but maybe the thought is what will count here.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It makes me sad. So, so sad.
customer_reviews.text: If I knew how sad it would make me feel I would never have bought this thing. The accuracy with which it strums my heartstrings is unparalleled.
customer_reviews.author: leprekawn

customer_reviews.title: Hand crank sunshine
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool music maker, I've always loved the song, you are my sunshine. The drawback is also a selling point. It's hand crank, I'd imagine that a kid would like it more, because of that. Sometimes though it would be nice to sit in the swing in the front yard, wind I up, close my eyes and think of my family. Either way it was worth it to me to buy it just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding music box. Got one of these for my 4 year old daughter and it was eventually misplaced. She loved to carry it around, turn the crank, and watch the music box as the song played. It's a great way to show kids how a music box works. We loved it so much that I ordered another one. Making sure we keep track of it this time! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mamabot

customer_reviews.title: Love love love. Clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints! Love the cute box it comes in. Love the clear sound and will be buying others from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: AlyBanana

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: this is the second music box that ive ordered. loooooove them. they play a surprisingly long section of the song and everyone knows right away exactly what song it is. place it in a box or bowl and the sound is amplified much more than you expect. my 5 year old plays with it all the time....while he is old enough to be careful, he is still 5 (lol) and it has held up nicely. a fun project we did together....we bought a wooden box and painted it together and simply glued the music box inside....lovely. would definitely recommend! everyone loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kershner

customer_reviews.title: I got the Twinkle Twinkle version and it sounds good and in-tune
customer_reviews.text: I got the Twinkle Twinkle version and it sounds good and in-tune. This in contrast to 2 other music boxes (the ones in clear acrylic cases) I bought from other sellers that were both flat.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: And I Say, It's Alright...
customer_reviews.text: Well, if this ain't grand, nothing is. Hold it in your hand, make it go, and feel the wonder!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little music trinket. Comes in a small box with the name of the song.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Rahn

customer_reviews.title: it's simple but it plays beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather always sang me this song as a child. I purchased this as a gift for my mother and when she started turning the handle to hear the melody, she had tears in her eyes and a smile. It's small, it's simple but it plays beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic musical fun
customer_reviews.text: This adorable music box is fun for all ages. The tune is clear and the crank is easy to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Seashells

customer_reviews.title: Cute, damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my Kikkerland collection at work. The item was wrapped so tightly with bubble wrap that the cardboard ended up being bent. The top flap doesn't stay down either. I'm sure I can fix it with a little scotch tape. Otherwise, the product works fine. For the price, I really can't complain. It's very cute and will be a nice addition to my collection. I only wish it wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: DSLA Online Shoppin Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lovely glad I bought it, also got over the rainbow as gifts they're pretty cute and work well. These are not for DIY snow globes if anyone had the idea like I did.
customer_reviews.author: mintyblue

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Little Gift for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I love these little crank music boxes and bought this one for my nephew‘s 4th Birthday as a companion to the Yellow Submarine movie and pop up book.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT LITTLE GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little present for my granddaughter. She’s going to love it! She saw that my daughter had given me the one that plays you are my Sunshine because I used to sing that to her as a baby. It’s a great memory maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short part but sounds wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's only a short part of the song, but it sounds absolutely wonderful and is a nice little item to have. I would love to have a more elaborate box that plays more of the song, and those can be found handmade, but tend to be hundreds of dollars. This suits my needs just fine to play just a bit of the melody of Stairway when I've the whim.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit Face

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It plays the song well, I just had assumed that it would have a plastic covering like most of it's kind that I have seen do. I also thought that it would be larger. It is about half of the size that I expected. I bought this for my mother in law for Christmas, and regardless of all those things, I'm sure she'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: wowtiskt

customer_reviews.title: Size slipped my mind but worked out great as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny I didn't think this through at first in size as it was a present for my blind and challenged family member. But she absolutely loved it. She is a huge Elvis fan an it's adorable to see her wind it. Still haven't figured out how to wind and get to play back on it's own though. Through no fault of the seller though. I have not tried to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: sweet notes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a box I am creating for my grandson "Jude". I found this delight on an internet search for "Hey Jude", ordered it and installed it in the wooden box I am making. I believe he will cherish it his entire life, since he is only one now. I am very "proud" of this purchas. Oh, yeah...it sounds great! Also this company had many other titles and I believe I will be back for some of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: david r.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: Not great, but not exactly junk. It took awhile to recognize the song. Not something I'd buy again,but made a great stocking stuffer for our newest 9 yr. old Beatles fan. Don't expect anything too sturdy, and it was a little smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: You’ve Got A Friend
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed to find out it was not the Toy Story song. It’s the James Taylor version of You’ve Got A Friend
customer_reviews.author: Madame Marie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME if you love music boxes..
customer_reviews.text: As a little girl, I grew up with a couple of music boxes. I love watching the gears move and the simple music it produces. My 7yo boy loves the music box I've had as a little girl. He watches the gears move and listens to the music just as I did before bed. I love this one because it doesn't have a case so you can see everything clearly, my boy loves this song AND he doesn't have to play with mine anymore which is quite delicate. This is great for $6!
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: He loved if, however the music box started malfunctioning in ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the Kikkerland music box for my 9 year old son. He loved if, however the music box started malfunctioning in last the 48 hr. Upset I gave feedback to the company ....I was impressed by how fast the company replaced the music box. Five star for this product ( which seems to work well ) and five star for this company as well.
customer_reviews.author: vancea

customer_reviews.title: lovely sound and extra notes make it very special
customer_reviews.text: I found one of these in a store, but they were sold out. I was so happy to find it here, but this is also a really lovely one. It is a turn crank, but that almost seems to add to the old world appeal of the song. In particular though, I love that it has smaller cadences that really makes the sound extra charming.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Typically would be a 5 star...
customer_reviews.text: I sadly give this one a 3 star only because for this song “You’ve got a friend” that phrase is NOT in the melody. Otherwise, sturdy and well constructed. This is my 3rd music box purchase from Kikkerland and is a great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I probably would have liked it if it were the song You’ve Got A Friend In Me. If that’s the song it was supposed to be then it was totally unrecognizable.
customer_reviews.author: lauren l.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. It comes with four songs twinkle twinkle ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It comes with four songs twinkle twinkle little star, Frerer Shaka, 10 little Indians, and old McDonald had a farm. I totally recommend this product for kids who likes music boxes
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Regester

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and it was a Christmas gift to my mother and she loved it. Nothing more to ask for. Lost 1 star only because it squeaks when you turn the key which is annoying. Also the box is a little hard to open without damaging it so if you're someone who wants to keep the box because it looks really vintage good luck not ripping it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and works great. Perfect gift for a music fan that has everything.
customer_reviews.author: SuDawnOfTime

customer_reviews.title: Memory Maker
customer_reviews.text: Memory Maker filled with hope. Who doesn't remember Dorothy in the Wizard of Oz? This cute little crank music box will take you back to that wonderful moment...I have purchased several different crank music boxes and I am very pleased with the quality...not a sour note. So with a song in my heart I gladly recommend and Thank Kikkerland for their quality products. Check out the other songs they have and get your own Memory Maker. Sincerely, kitti ~^••^~
customer_reviews.author: kitti/Ron

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This music box is so small you can put it in your hand and still close your hand! You have to put it up to your ear to hear the music. Very cute idea but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: karen williamson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: Brought it as a gift for Christmas. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: The music sounds beautiful, I purchased this years ago and it's still in perfect condition. Great little gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: A charming treasure for the Beatles fan
customer_reviews.text: These music boxes are truly wonderful. I have bought six of them over a few months for my brother's newborn son. Exposing the workings of the music box, the old-fashioned mechanics play a charming melody in a very evocative way. I purchased "Hey Jude" from Berryware Gifts and have been delighted with their service. Although my package was lost in the post, I contacted them and they sent another music box on its way very quickly and refunded my money. Excellent, thank you Berryware! Tip: place the base of the music box on the body of an acoustic guitar for an amplified sound, very reminiscent of ice-cream van music.
customer_reviews.author: WillG

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. TINY!
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware that this music box was only 1.5 inches x 1 inch (not counting small handle). I would not have originally purchased that size for $9. It is so very tiny! It is well made and works great. I bought it for a gift, but my kids want to keep it. :/ It would be easy to mail, and be a fun little thing to receive.
customer_reviews.author: 5Boys3Girls

customer_reviews.title: It's a music crank box...doesn't play the song they promoted.
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet crank box but does NOT play Toy Story You've Got a Friend in Me. I bought 4 and am now returning 4.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: I love this little music box
customer_reviews.text: I love this little music box. It has just the right pitch, and has a lovely tune. As a Beatles fan, I can definitely say that this lives up to the standard I had hoped for. As a music box fan, this made my heart smile. I will definitely be purchasing more of these little boxes. And with such a great price, I can certainly afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S-L

customer_reviews.title: I love this little music box
customer_reviews.text: I love this little music box. It has just the right pitch, and has a lovely tune. As a Beatles fan, I can definitely say that this lives up to the standard I had hoped for. As a music box fan, this made my heart smile. I will definitely be purchasing more of these little boxes. And with such a great price, I can certainly afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S-L

customer_reviews.title: love the music devices
customer_reviews.text: Love the song but the pitch is too high and it sounds very tinny. I have older versions of these little music devices and they are pitched to sound very melodic and mellow . I purchased "You Are My Sunshine " and although the pitch is a little high it is still listenable. I have let friends and family know about these little gems and can't wait for a wider selection of tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Head

customer_reviews.title: Mechanism clearly visible--but it doesn't come in acrylic box (for more protection).
customer_reviews.text: Very nice melody, but louder if you place on a table, counter, flat surface that can work like a "speaker."
customer_reviews.author: Kimmel0404

customer_reviews.title: Odd melody
customer_reviews.text: Sound is a bit clunky, and it's hard to make this sound like the actual song.. However, the tone is good and the music box resonates well when placed against a solid surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it was louder I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this music box except one (important) thing. It's not very loud. It's a beautiful song and a nice looking music box... you just need to be in a very quite place to enjoy it. I am not an expert on music boxes but I do have another one (not the same brand) that is much louder.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 7 mo old great grandson - should have paid more attention as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 mo old great grandson - should have paid more attention as I wanted one I could wind up and leave for him to listen too. Cost of return shipping almost as much as I paid for it so I'm saving it for when he is old enough to play it himself. Sound is a bit tinny and probably won't last long in the hands of a toddler
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: I should have picked Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
customer_reviews.text: It works, but there is really not a clear start or end point. As hard as I try, I cannot make out the intended song...at all. Just sounds like random notes.
customer_reviews.author: E*Trader

customer_reviews.title: The tune didn't sound quite right to me. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: The tune didn't sound quite right to me. Just a little off. I've purchased a couple of other of these music boxes (Somewhere Over the Rainblow and Pink Panther theme) and they seemed spot on. This one, not so much. Perhaps because it is a bit more complex to get on a tiny music box.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! My mother and mother in law both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Treat

customer_reviews.title: Its lit
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who didn't know, the jingle is Robert Plant singing not Jimmy Page's guitar
customer_reviews.author: Corey S

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a christmas present for her and she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Hey Jude is my girlfriend and I's song. I bought this as a christmas present for her and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: John Leary

customer_reviews.title: Great Music Box
customer_reviews.text: I found my first Kikkerland Crank Music Box in a cute little toy store here in town. I fell in love with the little crank box and I have been collecting them ever since. The last time I visited the toy store, they were out of the music box "Yesterday" so I was happy I found it on Amazon. The music box sounds great and I am extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband made a beautiful music box to house this player.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stocking stuffer, or for someone who doesn’t care about the size of their present! I got the one that plays Love Me Tender. It’s very small (fits in my palm), so if you were looking for a bigger music box, this one isn’t it. But it’s cute and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome but not as recognizable and clear like other songs ive gotten onky certain parts
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this little music box and the music sounds so sweet
customer_reviews.author: Linda Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my mother in law and thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my mother in law and thought it was a silly little thing. She loves it. It plays clearly and is lasting so far.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this was a great gift, was very pretty, and nice to listen to
customer_reviews.author: stephanie ....

customer_reviews.title: The product brings back sweet memories. Romantic Gift for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Cutest Gift ever!! My girlfriend loves it. Place it on any surface and the sound is louder. The product brings back sweet memories. Romantic Gift for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Paul Han

customer_reviews.title: Out of tune....
customer_reviews.text: Be aware there is no plastic cover for this music box, so it may be damaged easily by children. My copy was terribly out of tune, and the timing was actually off as you wound the level to play the song. Not overly impressed...
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: 💞😍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My brother loved it! Kinda wish I bought me one too! But I love vintage things and it’s a beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Quality is job number 432
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this is gone way downhill in the last 20 years. These new ones squeak, grind, and fall apart after just a few hours of use
customer_reviews.author: captain melissa

customer_reviews.title: You need a box
customer_reviews.text: Cute. But you need to put it in something for the sound to be really auditable.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good music box, one note was slightly flat
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this music box in a jewelry box I was making as a gift. It sounds really nice. One of the notes is slightly flat, but your mileage may vary. Overall I'd say this is a fun music maker and a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: cute enough by itself....but do up a box to place it in and its even cuter! sounds amazing....inside the box its aimplified even better! very small but cute....works like a charm! it definitely plays enough of the song that you immediately recognize it. so happy with it that I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kershner

customer_reviews.title: This toy is good other than the fact that it is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is good other than the fact that it is a bit out of tune, and there is a buzzing sound on a couple of the notes. But it was inexpensive and my child still loves to play with it, despite the minor pitch issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It fits in the palm and my hand and plays beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: ... other music boxes by the same manufacturer that worked fine. They were sent in boxes
customer_reviews.text: Update: Changed from one-star to three-star after my husband worked with it for some time. Bending the keys, he got it to sound pretty good. I can't say that I would necessarily advise this option, since your results may vary. I still can't recommend bubble-wrapped envelopes for music boxes, since these envelopes have too many opportunities to be crushed in transit.
customer_reviews.author: LRed

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little music box
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Bought it for my mom for her birthday and it showed up on time and she loves it too. I got the you are my sunshine one. It's on key and plays the whole verse. Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: My grandma absolutely loved it for her birthday, i highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 4 year-old granddaughter, who is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year-old granddaughter, who is into music and things mechanical. WAY too small for her age, kind of small even for my age!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to say many things!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these and they are so awesome. Great songs that say the right things. I have one and given out as presents. This is an excellent price from other brick and mortar retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan c.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 yr old because I always sing this song to him. It works perfectly and we both love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. A great "work" artifact for a small child.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loved it! Beautiful gift for The Beatles fans.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: great value wonderful personable gift providing music box version of ...
customer_reviews.text: great value wonderful personable gift providing music box version of friend's all time favorite song! wonderful vendor fast delivery! I will buy from again and again! Sincerely, Marc A. Medina
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Change in quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back and I loved it so much, I liked it so much I bought another for a friend last week. The quality they make these at now is no where near what I wanted. I guess the company made a cheaper product to save money. I won't be getting another until they start making them like they used to...
customer_reviews.author: Trey Alexander Nichols

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The music was not even close to "Let it Be". It was way off.
customer_reviews.author: new beginnings

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Music boxes are another old favorite of mine - perhaps yours as well. And how can you beat the Beatles? This little crank-operated music box is cute, appealing, and just plain fun! The tune is recognizable and you can play it until either you just plain get tired of it or your thumb falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plays perfectly but is much MUCH smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Too cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's homeroom teacher is a major Beatles fanatic and instead of the typical "teacher gift" my daughter wanted this for her end of year gift. It is way cool and the music is easily heard and has a soft sound to it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This little music box is very cute and small but it plays one of my daughter's favorite songs, it was a perfect stocking stuffer for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great present. And it amazes people how music boxes actually work too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It sounds like it and it seems to be well crafted and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey it works! It sounds like it and it seems to be well crafted and the box it comes in gives it some value too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plays the lyric melody, not the musical intro...If you were looking for that, best skip this one...Still a fun item to have...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would play the musical intro, not the lyric melody...That's why I gave it 3 stars...Pls make one that plays the musical intro, that's the one all zeppelin fans want...thnx...
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and play it whenever I have a “Senior moment” lol. I do love the movie and what it stands for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one was great. This one has a couple notes out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second music box. First one was great. This one has a couple notes out of tune. I hope with use it will adjust and sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Carr

customer_reviews.title: Poppin'
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend. We broke up. This product is good. My life sucks. That is all. Goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Lib

customer_reviews.title: O Fun!
customer_reviews.text: For a small crank music box, this thing is surprisingly fun. I purchased it to make a gift for a Canadian friend and it's a neat little thing. Nothing fancy, no frills, and plays correctly. I'm impressed, worth the few bucks I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress of the Fort

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and tiny. Fits in the palm of your hand. It plays only the main part of the song. Cute knick-knack for a Beatles lover.
customer_reviews.author: kbb8

customer_reviews.title: An almost lost art.
customer_reviews.text: The music box: the great grandfather of the iPod and no batteries required. For a person with a little time to kill and a few hand tools to revive, these music boxes are an excellent opportunity to make a surprising coffee table piece of conversation. My grandson loves it and he was born with te iPad in his hands!
customer_reviews.author: Poc-itto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to assemble a homemade music box for my mom's Mother's Day present. Tones can be heard clearly, especially if you mount this on a piece of heavy plastic, glass, or hard wood. I gave it to her early and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, tiny, just what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, because he constantly whistles this song, and he got a real kick out of it. It is pretty small but sounds just like a music box, very dainty. I think it was worth the money i spent on it and I am considering buying other ones for my other friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: alfab

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and make a nice tune. I can remember being intrigued by similar open music boxes as a child. My daughter enjoys a couple of them, but I also like to send them in Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes-they are sweet and don't need batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Watching the little gears turn is super cool.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 6 year old as a stocking stuffer. He LOVES it. Watching the little gears turn is super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maya L Chavez
